snippet.title: The Amazing Crackpots Club - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description:
Watch this frantic trailer for The Amazing Crackpots Club, a spell-slinging dueling game for up to four players, available now on PC via Steam Early Access. 

Choose between seven mages and use their unique abilities to shoot down your opponent’s magical flask, while defending your own. Take on your friends and loved ones in a variety of local and online modes.
